abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32737790, pmid32710178, pmid32738497, pmid32737462, pmid32738203, pmid32745239, pmid32738055, pmid32738255
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2020.08.05
